alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:01PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bannock and south central Bingham Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, or near Blackfoot, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. Moderate rainfall is likely as well. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of water in urban areas is possible. Locations impacted include... Blackfoot and Fort Hall Eagle Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
